description:
first of once you install, make sure you intall the plug ins you want to use like 117hd, quest helper, tile indicator, etc.
then open steam and add runelite as a external game, then open it in gaming mode or restart the steam deck, once in game you can press the steam button i think and open the button layout, i would reccomend a layout by vincent ez pvm or something like that and only thing i chaged was putting space bar as the (A) button, happy adventures ahead yall
-pal al

Music almost never works and cuts constantly. Other than that, it seems to work fine, but for anyone who actually wants music or audio effects, download the AppImage provided by the RuneLite team and just make yourself an shortcut.
music wil cut out regularly, bad java version bundled. either try AUR or install manually

Unfortunately I have some audio issues, most notable is the music does not play properly. I'll get a few seconds of audio and then it stops repeatedly. Otherwise, plugins and everything else works great.
Everything works fine, but you can't see any of the icons, the entire Runelite gui is just black.
The app doesn't launch: whenever you execute the application, the window will come up for a split second with a loading animation and will then close itself.
It's as if I were running it outside of Flatpak, but now I don't need Java installed on my system!
Works just fine. If you are on a Steam Deck the game can crash in ''Gaming mode'', but that isn't a huge deal.
Just go to "Disable hardware acceleration" in RuneLite/runelite GitHub.
summary: How to fix black screen or artifactis

description: Installed it again for the first time in a while and I no longer need to turn off hardware acceleration and there's not artefacting when using the GPU renderer. (mesa on AMD)
Everything works well, I love RuneLite. However, on 4k UI is very small (RuneScape UI scales well, only RuneLite UI does not).
summary: Works well, except on 4k - small UI

description: I absolutely love this client. I can do whatever i need. It is an amazing client

i will rate this better if i find a workbaround or it gets patched but i cannot type anything into the appllication correcttly anuything on the nastive phosh keyboard im using wit manjaro arm phosh on pine ubports CE
summary: app opens and runs smooth but keyboard input not matching up with app

description: It works fine but I get about 30fps less vs running the appimage directly. Probs due to how flakpak work but not worth the performance hit really, just use the appimage instead (from runelite's official site.)
